sense.name: transmit over the airways
sense.examples: We cannot broadcast this X-rated song. Which station broadcasts 'I Love Lucy' reruns? YouTube lets you broadcast yourself.

sense.name: cause to become widely known
sense.examples: Why don't you broadcast my parent's divorce while you're at it? She wouldn't want this broadcast all over town.

sense.name: sow over a wide area, esp. by hand
sense.examples: He asked them to broadcast seeds on both sides of the road.
